title: Phiguring out acids and bases
creator_credit: Shane Mulcahy, Trish Pilley, Glen Foster, Deborah Lawther and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
brief_description: Examines the acids and bases in everyday use and develops the idea of ph measurment both quantitatively and qualitatively as a measure of concentration.This program presents historical developments of the proton/theory and pH notation. Practical applications of pH testing and adjustments are also covered.
creator_credit_for_label: Shane Mulcahy, Trish Pilley, Glen Foster, Deborah Lawther and Box Hill College of Technical and Further Education
